perturbation.original_text: 1.1 ADVERTISING shall mean any paid advertisements, links, pointers, sponsorships, buttons, banners, navigation, or any other placements or promotions or similar services or rights on a Site, but excluding Advertising that is not paid for or which is part of an overall partnering or revenue sharing arrangement and any Product Listings.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 ADVERTISING shall mean any advertisements, links, pointers, sponsorships, buttons, banners, navigation, or any other placements or promotions or similar services or rights on a Site, including those that are not paid for or which is part of an overall partnering or revenue sharing arrangement and any Product Listings.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by broadening the definition of Advertising to include elements initially excluded, thus conflicting with Section 7, which outlines revenue sharing for 'paid advertisements'. It blurs the distinction between paid and unpaid promotion, causing uncertainty regarding revenue distribution.
